<title level="1" pfs="">[Deghuun (Children Of Mhar)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=975)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Mhar, an ancient evil deity of caverns, mountains, and volcanoes, belongs to the pantheon of the Great Old Ones—monstrous beings of alien intellect and unfathomable power. The so-called children of Mhar (known as deghuuns in the chaotic tongues of Mhar's enraptured cultists) physically resemble blue-gray octopods made of stone, mud, and molten iron. Venthole-like craters dot the surface of a deghuun's body, through which the creature can gaze out with a single golden eye that it can move from crater to crater.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Deghuun.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Children Of Mhar](/Monsters.aspx?ID=975)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 78</row>

**Perception** +30; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +37

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +6

**Con** +8

**Int** -1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The deghuun ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke or smog, including from Sulfurous Plume.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +34 

**Ref** +30 

**Will** +26 

</row>

**HP** 420

**Immunities**
fire, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=271))

**Weaknesses**
cold 10, good 10

**Unfathomable Aspect** Anytime a deghuun attempts a Will save against an [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) spell, the spell's caster must attempt a DC 38 Will save or become [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for up to the spell's duration.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacle +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+17 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lava ball +34 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 4d6+17 bludgeoning plus 3d6 fire

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 38
- **6th**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94) (×3), [Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144)
- **8th**
[Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95)

**Beak Crunch** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The deghuun has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with its tentacles; **Effect** The creature takes 4d8+17 piercing damage.

**Sulfurous Plume** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) The deghuun vents caustic smog for 1d4 rounds. Any creature that ends its turn within 30 feet of the deghuun during this time takes 6d6 fire damage and is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (DC 38 Fortitude save; the creature avoids the sickened condition on a critical success, or is sickened 2 on a critical failure). While sickened in this way, a creature takes a –2 status penalty to its saving throw against the deghuun's [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=144). Any creature that's in the smog is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) and treats other creatures as concealed. Strong winds dissipate the smog.

**Tentacle Assault** <actions string="Single Action" />  The deghuun makes three tentacle Strikes, each against a different creature within reach. These attacks count toward its multiple attack penalty as normal.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png">Scions of the Elder Mythos</title>

Children of Mhar are not the only agents of the Great Old Ones and Outer Gods to emerge on Golarion. [Gibbering mouthers](/Monsters.aspx?ID=227) supposedly have some connection to unholy Abhoth, and the ancestors of the Darklands-dwelling chardas were once potent clerics of Orgesh, the Faceless God.
</aside>
name: Children Of Mhar
